label.phrase: to provide educated christians with something less dangerous in subject-matter than virgil while possessing all the charm of the epic manner and machinery and that it was for this he chose the battle of the virtues and the vices he is certainly very virgilian and he certainly carries out tertullian's recipe for a sublimation of the gladiatorial taste
